2.text: “Dominion and fear are with him. He makes peace in his high places.

3.text: Can his armies be counted? On whom does his light not arise?

4.text: How then can man be just with God? Or how can he who is born of a woman be clean?

5.text: Behold, even the moon has no brightness, and the stars are not pure in his sight;

6.text: How much less man, who is a worm, the son of man, who is a worm!”
